name: Tatertot Towers
description:
Help Tatertot defend the mouse town!  Build towers and fight off hoards of enemies.  Collect resources and upgrade your buildings to stand a better chance. Can you delaying the inevitable?

  • Fight enemies and collect resources!
  • Build and upgrades structures!
  • Survive waves of enemies!
  • Play story or endless mode!

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50 Jam. The theme was "delay the inevitable". 

Join the Discord!

Note: The game may take a moment to load. If the game does not load you may have to enable WebGL on your browser.

Controls
  • Move - WASD
  • Jump - Space
  • Attack - left mouse
  • Build - right mouse
  • Rotate Camera - click and drag right mouse
  • Full reset - 0 (zero)

** You can rebind your controls in the pause menu!
